data.title: Kutjevo Archives
data.text:
Kutjevo

Related Reviews

Adzic 2015 Graševina (Kutjevo)

89 Points | $20

This straw-colored wine has delightful aromas of white jasmine, cotton candy and violets. Flavors recall guava, mango and papaya. Medium bodied and well balanced, it...

Read Full Review

Enjingi 2012 Graševina Welschriesling (Kutjevo)

89 Points | $15

This medium-straw colored wine opens with floral notes of jasmine and honeysuckle. On the palate, there's a strong caramelized apple flavor, as well as a...

Read Full Review

Enjingi 2006 Rajnski Rizling Kasna Berba Suho Riesling (Kutjevo)

89 Points | $25

This white is medium straw colored, with aromas of dried apricot and canned peaches. In the mouth, there are lush flavors of fresh and dried...

Read Full Review

Enjingi 2009 Barrique Zweigelt (Kutjevo)

90 Points | $25

Produced by a talented winemaker in the Kutjevo region, it has brilliant ruby color plus enticing aromas of purple violets, lavender and freshly picked red...

Read Full Review

Enjingi 2009 Graševina Welschriesling (Kutjevo)

84 Points | $13

Floral and fruity up front with sweet lychee, stonefruit and jasmine flower notes, this is a refreshing wine with zesty acidity and a clean, grassy...

Read Full Review

Krauthaker 2005 Unfiltered Sauvignon Blanc (Kutjevo)

82 Points | N/A

The regular aromas and flavors of Sauvignon Blanc are here but faint—citrus, grass—and there's a stinky egg quality that overrides the whole. Earthy but odd,...

Read Full Review

Krauthaker 2005 Rosenberg Unfiltered Chardonnay (Kutjevo)

85 Points | N/A

This unfiltered Croatian Chardonnay is appealing in its minerally restraint—offering a refreshing zip under a round, flavorful fruit character. It's not terribly complex but it...

Read Full Review

Krauthaker 2006 Pinot Gris (Kutjevo)

83 Points | N/A

This Croatian Pinot Gris is easy and likable, with its citric, spicy nose and simple, balanced flavors of spice, citrus and steely minerality. Fresh and...

Read Full Review
